website_summaries.verdict: Horizon's highlight reel is unlike anything you've experienced before, but the time between these tentpole events could have been more engaging.
pros: Horizon Zero Dawn is a beautifully envisioned open-world action RPG with a great combat system, gorgeous visuals and jaw-dropping enemies
It's one of the best-looking PS4 games to date and gives you dozens of hours of fun, filled with possibilities
cons: Many of the seemingly endless side quests and errands lack any serious substance and the dizzying amount of looting and crafting can start to feel tedious and trivial not long after you start the game

customer_reviews.title: All on the disc, and all awesome
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, Guerella, for putting the expanded content on the freakin' disc. The game just installs and goes, it's perfect. The added content is more of the same - which is to say awesome. HZD is a breath of fresh air in a crowed stale room full of open-world grindfests, and this edition proves there's more where that came from.
customer_reviews.author: Samson Wick

customer_reviews.title: Cool fun chopping up mechanical giant gobblers
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular scenery! Cool fun chopping up mechanical giant gobblers. Hell, I’m 75 years old and can’t turn this game off!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Woolly

customer_reviews.title: I had to go for the Platinum Trophy!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is not overly challenging. In fact, it can be quite forgiving with auto-saved and with difficulty progression. I’m.not saying you won’t have tough fights but it is not about difficulty. It’s about taking in the beauty of a post-apocalypse word, with interesting g narrative on religion, culture l-building and a great sci-fi story overall. Oh, and it’s just fun So much so that I could not put this game down until I finished it all. I’m just missing game plus on hard.
customer_reviews.author: R. noloc

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic, Beautiful, and Engaging Game
customer_reviews.text: I'm an older gamer. I grew up with SNES/SEGA, got a Playstation my freshman year of college, and managed multiple Funcoland (now Gamestop) stores around 2000. I've seen a lot of systems and played a lot of games. This game hands-down has the best graphics, some of the most engaging gameplay, and most enjoyable gaming experience I've seen. If I had any complaints I would say that there needed to be a bit more 'gritty' feel to the world for a bit more authenticity, and that there should have been some more secrets, and perhaps a larger superboss to beat ala Ruby Weapon. But these are minor quibbles not worth deducting a star.
customer_reviews.author: Arctic Altoid

customer_reviews.title: A Zelda styled game for older people.
customer_reviews.text: Warning their may be spoilers. If you've played a Zelda game or the Tomb Raider Reboot you'll have good idea of what to expect gameplay wise. But if you haven't its an action RPG. Overall I liked its open world, story, visuals, combat, characterization of many of the cast. But its not perfect some of the dialogue at certain points felt hammy at times and the CQC of the game needed some polish. And if your wondering what the Special PS theme is it just gold and black still images of the games art. Overall I consider this game better then the standard version as it fixes many of its original faults.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Variell

customer_reviews.title: This game is a masterpiece!
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOD!!! Anything i could possibly write about this guy would not be enough. THIS GAME IS A MASTERPIECE. The story is amazing and a good view on how far south things can go after the machine uprising. This game has EVERYTHING. Beautiful views, an engaging protagonist, amazing weapon and combat system, and the enemies you fight are enough to get your heart pumping. You rarely find a game that despite the fact you would most certainly be in mortal danger, you want to jump into. If you don't already have this game, then i don't know what you are still waiting for.
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite games ever
customer_reviews.text: I dont like open world or shooters but this game one me over. One of my favorite games ever, its stunning. It not only looks good, it plays so good. Everything is smooth, combat and environment. Mecha movements and the AI is outstanding, never played a game where the AI changed to play against you.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games for PS4 that came out in 2017
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games for PS4 that came out in 2017. It's an open world game where you take the on the role of Aloy, a Nora whose cast out from her tribe and doesn't know who her mother is. The combat is a lot of fun - robots are dangerous and you employ a variety of tricks, traps and weapons in order to hunt and take them down safely. The quests are interesting and the characters and good. I loved every moment of this game and plan on getting platinum in it. The world is rich and the story is too. The more your play and dig, the more things you discover, the more interesting it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Jubilant

customer_reviews.title: Solid Game well worth the price & time
customer_reviews.text: Picked up Horizon Zero Dawn on sale, very impressed with the game finished the main game currently on the dlc. I would recommend doing the weapon tutorials when you get them, they are listed under the quest section. Decent story nice environment good graphics. Its not Skyrim or Witcher 3 but its still a very good game.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Hold on tight or will slide right out of your hand!!
customer_reviews.text: This case is slippery than glass Trying to hold it.. My other case was a little rough on back so it didn't slip and slide! Is just Awful! Is Worse than Glass!! Unreal!! I guess you get what you pay for!! Very disappointed with this! The color is ok..Slides right out of my hand..
customer_reviews.author: marjo

customer_reviews.title: Masterpiece game!
customer_reviews.text: This game took everyone by surprise, the theme was extremely appealing, and the gameplay reminded us of a futuristic Tomb Raider like gaming. Aside from these facts, the storyline, oh man! There should be a movie about this, it's so refreshing and wonderful, I enjoyed every step of the way, and the expansion "Frozen Wilds" is even better!! This game is such an experience, nobody should miss, I definitely recommend, specially to those who love strategy and fast pace action like shooting from a distance in gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph Glen

customer_reviews.title: One of the best ever.
customer_reviews.text: This game is ridiculously good. I could tell it was going to be amazing from the first hour of play. It's a perfect balance of combat, crafting, and exploration. The story is great, but I had to look a lot up online to make sense of it all, as it is quite complex. The combat is a ton of fun. You have to really know each opponent, and what their weaknesses are. This game is right up there with The Witcher 3 as one of the best ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best of this generation!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gameplay that values strategy and forethought with a beautiful world to navigate around in. The story benefits from the dystopic setting where technology is perceived to be relics of the past that primitive humans are unable to understand, and playing through Aloy is simply a treat in terms of character growth, and how she deals with her surroundings, discovering meaning in what those around her can't decipher. Epic story, gamechanging gameplay, and a universe that is ripe for further development and discovery. Must play!
customer_reviews.author: AFZ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Game. Possibly my all time favorite.
customer_reviews.text: What a masterpiece of a game. I've been playing the game for about twenty hours now and all I can say is, wow. First off, the graphics are truly breathtaking. Secondly, the controls are very intuitive. Thirdly, the gameplay is incredibly addicting. And lastly, I find the story to be interesting. What an awesome game. And since the price is only about fifteen dollars now on Amazon, you owe it to yourself to check it out. It's well worth it, I am telling you.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Freakin’ SWEET!
customer_reviews.text: Amaze balls! I can’t believe this game went under the radar for so many people. One of the best games I’ve played on my PS4 in a very long time. The game is so well structured and thought out. Did I say it’s freakin’ addicting?! So beautiful and such love went into the story too. Gameplay is not overly complicated but complex enough to be challenging. I started with hard and it was hard, then I just got lazy and went into easy mode. Not worth taking off a star is some of the physics and AI where I was able to cheat the system in killing harder monsters.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game. Totally recommend, no questions
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking about getting the game, get it. Loved it. Only had one glitch (over the 50+ hrs) of getting stuck in the ground, but it resolved itself. It's SO SATISFYING to take down the machines. Any time I was frustrated I knew it was because of my lack of skill. The only 'cheap' monster was the one that burrows under ground. It kind of reminded me of monster hunter in a way. Graphics were great, story kept me interested, world is very fleshed out. Finding artifacts and listening to how the people think of them is fun. I probably laughed too much at the guy collecting the animal figurines.
customer_reviews.author: dblamcvy

customer_reviews.title: Its a good game but by no means is it outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Its a good game but by no means is it outstanding. Simple actions like jumping, climbing and swimming are sorely lacking compared to games like Uncharted or Witcher 3. Not a lot of options when it comes to choices like weapons, armor or skills. Combat can be fun, especially if you're playing on harder difficulties where you can get 1 shot. This game is pretty good but the most frustrating part about it for me is that saves can only be performed at campfires, which are aplenty, but why not just have an autosave or manual save out of combat. So weird.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hansen

customer_reviews.title: This game was surprise !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game with Witcher 3 GOTY edition, so it took a long time for me to start playing this game. At first I was going "this is a waste of money purchase"... But after the tutorials, and getting used to the controls.. I was enjoying the game plot, story, and action, gameplay, etc... I would strongly recommend playing it, and keep playing until you get used to the controls, and then play the Game+ ... I liked it. Wish there would be like a sequel to it, so far, there is none expected. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Honest ABE

customer_reviews.title: Hunting robot dinosaurs is freaking awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite games I've ever played, and for around 10 or $15 it's incredible. Just make sure you get the complete edition no matter where you buy it from, and not the original. Voice acting is hit-or-miss, but the story is very creative and involved. Main character is extremely likeable. The combat is my favorite part, and hunting metal dinosaurs is freaking awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure how I'm going to enjoy another game when I finish this one
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how I'm going to enjoy another game when I finish this one. The main character is fierce, funny and an overall total B.A. The graphics are so insanely pretty I find myself sending my character to clifftops just to enjoy the view. I love that she battles it out using a bow and arrow and a few other primitive tools that involve utilizing both strategy and skill. It's so fun. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you're a fan of Skyrim, Bethesda's Fallout, or Breath of the Wild, this is a must buy.
customer_reviews.text: A great, complete, DLC included version of the game that takes a gigantic leap off the open-world "Skyrim"-type games. Moving forward from Skyrim (which continues to be the same game re-released over and over again), and moving forward from Fallout 3, 4, and the like, there is plenty to do, plenty to hunt, and even a compelling narrative to tie it all together.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GAME - LETS GET THE NEXT LEVEL GOING
customer_reviews.text: This game is great. I loved the involvement. It also spoiled me and now I have trouble with games that do not meet my expectations based on this game. It was fun, challenging and a lot of unexpected challenges. You need to go beyond this and the addition. We want another one. It was GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the best game I've played on PS4. Certainly more fun than a lot of the other single-player games I've finished. Even when some other games are better in some fashion, this one's more fun to play. Personally my favorite thing in the game is the long range combat against big machines with the bow... especially fighting Thunderjaws out in the world. But it's also pretty awesome how Aloy moves... climbs, jumps, rolls; and the visuals / scenery of the world is beautiful; and the story's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: JohnR

customer_reviews.title: A must-buy for PS4 gamers
customer_reviews.text: For the price they are asking this is a steel, one of the best PlayStation 4 games I have ever played with the expansion included for this price even I'm shocked they're selling it for such a cheap price if you haven't played this game yet then I highly recommend you do. Amazing game, fantastic graphics and an amazing story. Lots of action in this game also a lot of looting. One of the best games on the PlayStation 4 hands down and one of the most beautiful looking.
customer_reviews.author: @relativitycraft

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Action RPGs of All Time
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Action RPGs ever made. This game perfects world discovery, with platforming similar to something you'd see in uncharted, the first time I've really enjoyed using a bow and arrow as the main weapon, graphics that stand up to something you'd expect from a hefty gaming rig, a narrative that could stand on it's own as a movie, and so much to do in the DLC that's included. Not only is this a game you should get if you have a PS4, this might be enough of a reason to pick up a system with a few other exclusives (Persona 5, Uncharted, Last of Us, and Until Dawn are some of my Favorites)
customer_reviews.author: JimmyRoche

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful game, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I had so many friends tell me this was the best game ever. Honestly it is super good looking, and the story is compelling it, but I am not the kind of person who enjoys setting up traps and tactically killing things. IF you are a rusher, or into running and gunning, this is probably not the game for you. That being said it is one of the best looking games on PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing open world RPG!
customer_reviews.text: This game is great on so many levels. 1. Amazing story 2. Beautiful graphics 3. Unique functionality to weaponry 4. Great characters and voice acting 5. Engaging battles with unique "robot dinosaur" like battles. 6. Very slick/user friendly UI, HUD and crafting system. 7. The complete edition adds The Frozen Wilds which is a great expansion with tons of great new content and story without messing with the main story. This game is a must play!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: stinks
customer_reviews.text: have to forage for stuff just to make a arrow. just let me kill some things. games got to real. next i will have to work 8 hours at the post office before i can shoot stuff
customer_reviews.author: Ken Mol

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: The game is really long and the graphics are amazing. For a casual gamer who is occupied for most of the day I did not have any difficulties learning the game or getting back into after being occupied during the week. The DLC was a great addition to the game and with the PS4 Pro really shows just how great the graphics can be pushed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game
customer_reviews.text: First of all the world in this game is gorgeous. The robotic enemies are extremely fun to fight - all of them. Humans are kinda boring though. The facial expressions when people talk can be ridiculous at times, but the overall story is fairly engrossing and Aloy is a good protagonist. The DLC is rather large and adds quite a bit of cool content and story/lore.
customer_reviews.author: M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...not amazing
customer_reviews.text: I believe the hype led me to be disappointed. Compared to the last of us or the witcher this game is not in the same league. People told me "it's like tomb raider combined with the witcher" and since I'm a huge fan of both I thought it would be spectacular. Not a bad game but gets repetitive.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games for the PS4.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games for the PS4. Horizon Zero Dawn has a really compelling story, fluid action and great graphics that really pulls you into the game and the contect. Lead with a female protagonist, Horizon does a really great job in it's presentation and story. The game, does have some bugs when it comes to lip tracking but they are far and few apart. Otherwise, this is a highly recommended, open world adventure game that is challenigng and compelling all in one.
customer_reviews.author: Leo A. Newball Jr.

customer_reviews.title: BUT I'm glad I did cos I've been pretty addicted to this ...
customer_reviews.text: I forgot I pre-ordered this game...BUT I'm glad I did cos I've been pretty addicted to this game.... well this and breath of the wild but they're pretty much the same game. this ones just more adult themed? Yay for female protag and intense story and gameplay, it gets so intense I need to take breaks sometimes ;;
customer_reviews.author: Raie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful world with tons of things to explore
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this game. There were so many side quests and adventures to explore that I took my time doing the main story line. It's beautiful. The music is awesome. The haptic feedback in the controller is actually useful for planning strategies and knowing what's around you without seeing. I really like killing the bandits. and figuring out how to take down the larger machines. and trying to collect all of the things to get goodies. And now I get to start the story over with all the stuff I gathered. It's going to be awesome! (more bandits to kill!)
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect open world gameplay and story
customer_reviews.text: I thought a game centered on hunting machines with a bow and arrow would have a horrible storyline, but I am glad to be wrong! This game is on Zelda & FarCry level of advanced open world gameplay and the story has more depth and thought than I have seen in most adventure games. The controls are perfect and combat is challenging yet satisfying
customer_reviews.author: Joe Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Please buy and immerse yourself in this game!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!!!!! This game is stunning. I purchased this game two years ago and am now writing reviews for all of my orders. This game is a must have for any video game lover. Story is the best part, the visuals alone are terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally review items....but wow! Absolutely gorgeous, amazing story, great characters, and stellar gameplay. Say goodbye to your weekends. TIP* read a weapons and damage tutorial before or shortly after starting to save yourself some grief and get to know the systems, makes the game that much more enjoyable not being frustrated at defeating tougher monsters
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Very cool game. Great art.
customer_reviews.text: The full game is great. It has awesome art, cool fighting style, and semi customizable weapons. Would have preferred more unique weapons, but what ya gonna do? The dlc is ok. It’s basically the same thing as the regular game, with nothing really added.
customer_reviews.author: chas

customer_reviews.title: My God
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a kid playing this. I get gritty near the end of each work day because I'm excited to play it as soon as I get home. Beautiful environments, interesting characters, combat I find myself getting hyped about every stealth kill (rewarding for some reason). Well made, I'm obsessed with this game.
customer_reviews.author: Hooberstank

customer_reviews.title: Hours and hours well spent! A single-player must buy.
customer_reviews.text: I had rented this game's original edition out of curiosity, and found a surprisingly expansive single payer experience. I had spent 15 hours of playtime just exploring a FOURTH of the world. The diverse environments that will make you stop and stare, two dozen enemy types to conquer, a variety of weapons to customize and discover, the AWESOME lore to find both in the open world and enclosed areas that reveal the past and explain the present, on top of the surprises in not just the main story, but added in the Frozen Wilds DLC, make this game a must buy for a single-player gamer like me. Oh, and the voice acting is pretty much top notch.
customer_reviews.author: J.R. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I received this game yesterday and I have been glued to it! It is such a beautiful work of art! The graphics are amazing, the lighting is awesome, the facial animations are really good, and the gameplay is so good! It has such a huge open world filled with things to do. I am very happy I decided to go with this game, it is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Elixir V

customer_reviews.title: Must have game for any PS4!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas, he was so inlove with this game. Very glad we waited for the complete edition. Beautiful game mechanics, visuals are amazing and the Open world feel did nothing but enhance the experience you can have. Best to play on a High Definition display so you can truly be engulfed in this world! Aloy is amazing, try Playstation Princess!!
customer_reviews.author: audra smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game, No Case
customer_reviews.text: I received this game not in a case, but in a cheap-ish (still official, albeit in Spanish) cardboard sleeve. I would have preferred a case, and others may be expecting the same when they purchase, -1 star for not making that clearly known However, the game was fine, CD in pristine condition, and is very fun so far. P.S. If you're playing in 4K, adjust your tv's HDR settings so the colors don't appear washed out
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Husbands

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: the graphics in this game is stellar. It has the right amount of challenges. It is not easy to beat, which is nice because I get bored easily with games that make it to easy to play. I was a bit skeptical when first purchasing this game. it seemed to not be something that would appeal to me long term, I am glad I gave it a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Redmonica

customer_reviews.title: A most have game for your ps4 collection
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game!!!! Definitely one of Sony top exclusive titles. The graphics are just breathtaking and the environment on par with uncharted. A most have game
customer_reviews.author: Drake

customer_reviews.title: if i played tbis game sooner
customer_reviews.text: Super fun game. Including for the age of this game! I got it 4 or 5 years later of the console being made. And they finally released red dead redemption 2 lol! They finally released it after claiming it would be released sooner! Haa and its graphics equal that games! But im sure you guys who played this game know that! 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: Great story !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the story narrative of this game. Combat it sometimes a bit monotonous but the overall experience was great. Bought this game for my daughter because of both our love for RPG. The lead female character wonderful, Combat on normal difficulty sometimes challenging early in the game. If you're looking for something post Skyrim and Fallout 4 here is your game!
customer_reviews.author: The Penguin Popper

customer_reviews.title: Very fun game
customer_reviews.text: One of the most enjoyable games I have ever played. It has a good storyline and keeps you actively engaged. One of the best things is it is not "easy". You have to think and plan because the enemies are strong. The graphics and design are beautiful. I was very happy when I finally figured out where I was. This is not a hack and slash. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gordy

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best games I've ever played.
customer_reviews.text: I had become a bit jaded about games. They all seemed to trend towards MMO games with epic battles and the large world exploring experience was going away. Horizon Zero Dawn is the epic, stunningly beautiful game with a HUGE open world. It is going to be put in the same category of Fallout 4 and Skyrim.
customer_reviews.author: James Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Over rated!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very over rated game. Graphics are the only thing really good. No action For almost the whole first hour of game play. Not that good if you like immediate action and fun. You tube it if you don’t believe me!!
customer_reviews.author: jmoore

customer_reviews.title: One woman's Journey or Wonderland with machines
customer_reviews.text: The gameplay is a little difficult to get used to but overall once you get the hang of it it's the best experience you can ever have in the open world video game besides Witcher 3
customer_reviews.author: Omari A

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my partner said they wanted to beat it on the hardest difficulty. They did not do that, but it was still an epic game. It's way more interesting than I thought it would be--and way more gameplay and interesting plot than I gave it credit for. Very awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mads S.

customer_reviews.title: Vast world, Fluid Combat, Unique Universe, Detailed Environments
customer_reviews.text: Horizon Zero Dawn reminds me of Witcher 3, with a vast world to explore, plenty of combat, and a unique universe to be a part of. The two things that concerned me were some of dialogue and lack of facial animations of certain characters, which drew away from immersion in the game. Despite this, the combat is fluid, there are many things to do and explore, and the environment itself is incredibly detailed. Definitely worth a try in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Il-Rev

customer_reviews.title: Robo dinos - do I really need to say more?
customer_reviews.text: Best game of 2017!!!! It does not reinvent the wheel, but robot dinos and interesting story = double dip!!! This is the 2nd time buying the game after I traded it in originally, and regretted it
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: Great game that has an amazing open world and tons ...
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged and on time. Great game that has an amazing open world and tons of combat (there is a story mode for those who prefer less/easy combat) about nine hours into the game and I am having a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl97

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Game!
customer_reviews.text: This game is incredible. I played all the side missions and the DLC and loved every bit of it. My husband, who plays way more video games than I, loved it as well and agreed that it was well-made and very fun. The DLC was challenging and added more to the story that made me excited at the prospect of a sequel.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Take Down the Machines!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say that I'm sure everybody hasn't already said. Great game and definitely worth picking up at this price. The gameplay alone is worth it. This isn't something you'll be done with in one day that's for sure. There's plenty of content to keep you occupied for awhile. Great pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. RogersTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It is SUCH a good game. There are a few parts though where it is unpolished or the voice acting is trash and they really stick out cause the rest of the game is FIRE! If you like solo exploration, justice kills, and recruiting robotic dinosaurs, you'll like this game. Definitely in my top 3 of all time games.
customer_reviews.author: Lil' Sis

customer_reviews.title: Boring.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful game. Slow and dull to actually play. I don't even know what the point is after spending several hours with it. Other than Red Dead 2, this is the most boring game I have ever played.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying single player game with an interesting story
customer_reviews.text: This was a steal at less than $20. This game had a great original story and the gameplay was satisfying. The added expansion adds a good amount of content to the already sizable game. One of my favorite games on the PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game! It has the DLC included.
customer_reviews.text: Nice presentation including the base game plus the DLC "The Frozen Wilds". It is recommended to be leveled up enough before tackling the expansion content.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Crashes every ~10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Although I've enjoyed the game when I've been able to play it, it crashes every 10 minutes or so. Some searching has turned up that this is a problem for a _lot_ of people. Nobody seems to know why: solutions run from "Only run this on the Playstation Pro" to "Never, ever, ever patch the game" "Send in your Playstation for repair." None of which sound like they're fully successful, seem reasonable, or should be necessary. Save your $20 for something you can actually play.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rush

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game play with a very good story. I am hoping for a sequel because it seems like they could do even more with the story, but the story with the complete edition and included DLC was good with a nice ending. The game lived up to the hype that you can easily find on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Graphics, gameplay and storytelling mesh extremely well.
customer_reviews.text: While I'm not finished with the game yet it is absoultely great. And the fact that it has the DLC on the disc already is even better. It is an absolutely gorgeous game with what so far is a great storyline and great gameplay. If you're a fan of open world games I highly recommend picking this up.
customer_reviews.author: thewheelman84

customer_reviews.title: Best Playstation game of 2017
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best story based game I played of 2017 and still playing in 2018. Bought this on sale for only $20. An amazing deal for this type of quality game. If you're looking for a game to keep you busy and entertained then I can't recommend this game enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tt

customer_reviews.title: Purchase this game.  An incredible open world game that I hope they make another one in the near future
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite game in a long time. The story line is incredible and one of the few titles I played all of the side quests. If you like open world games this is the best one. The price has gone down and is now an even more incredible deal. Do not delay just purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Addicting and challenging
customer_reviews.text: This game is a good challenge and addicting when you get in a groove. I’m not usually much of a single player story game person but this game is just awesome. The graphics are absolutely beautiful as well. It’s really a game that anyone can love.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Bearb

customer_reviews.title: Played this though twice
customer_reviews.text: This was the second game I bought for my new PS4. I love it...great storyline and fun gameplay. I love open world games where you get to explore. I ended up playing it twice back to back. Took me about 100 hours to finish it the first time on Normal mode.
customer_reviews.author: Cory L

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much of a gamer, but Horizon Zero Dawn was amazing. I got addicted to playing it really fast. The game is open world, meaning you can go wherever you want to and explore different lands. It takes a while to complete. A lot of side missions and tasks, so you're never bored. The graphics are beautiful. The storyline for me was interesting and made me want to finish the game quickly to see the conclusion of it. You won't be disappointed, trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Morales

customer_reviews.title: Pretty addictive
customer_reviews.text: This is one pretty darned fun game. Lots of freedom to explore, and four levels of difficulty to choose from (I started with the Story level - the easiest level that "lets you focus more on the storyline") and have been moving up in difficulty since. Great graphics, very fluid movement, terrific storyline - what's not to like? So far, nothing. I sort of screwed up in the Story mode in that I did not enter the Frozen Wilds (an add-on) before the final confrontation. The game ended, though it will let you continue playing after the official finale. I think I'm getting my money's worth out of this one....
customer_reviews.author: Matthew O Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I was sure I would hate this title but I was pleasantly surprised by how well this game is made. It very didn’t try to stuff modern political agendas down my throat, it would have received 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Enzo

customer_reviews.title: The code for the add on is invalid
customer_reviews.text: so i went on my ps4 and redeemed the code but it says it is a code that already been used. Just but the regular version and purchase the dlc separately.
customer_reviews.author: Micah LTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Love this game...
customer_reviews.text: My style of game, open world roaming to explore etc.. can move the story line along at your own pace.. Intriguing storyline... can play this over and over as there are always little things Im finding that I missed before..
customer_reviews.author: Scott F

customer_reviews.title: Yes. Amazing. Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Read so many reviews on this before buying as it’s not a style of game that I would typically play, but for a semi gamer as myself I got addicted to this right from the get go. I even love the side mission and errands. To keep it short, every good thing you hear about this game is absolutely without a doubt true.
customer_reviews.author: Caron Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic game. I had no idea what I was in for - hadn't even heard of it, just bought it bc it was cheap. So so sooooo good. Gameplay, graphics, story line - I'm obsessed. Please play this if you haven't!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Reger

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: An excellently done game that you can play for over 60 hours. It takes some getting used to (the combat controls) but it's a great RPG that you can play alone and don't need a Play Station Plus subscription for (I hate games that require that)
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A well designed and built game.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games I’ve ever played. For those not into a good story this isn’t the game for you. There is a lot of talking at some points to better help you understand characters and plot line. I personally enjoy the style of a playable book. With lots of machines to hunt and a lot of areas to play through it’ll keep you interested the whole time. Having beaten the game I immediately played the game again on ultra hard mode. I look forward to Guerrilla Games’ next one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeseger27

customer_reviews.title: Dumb
customer_reviews.text: I do not see why this game was so popular, it gets boring in terms of gameplay quickly, and the story is cool for five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.  Absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Absolutely perfect. My favorite video game since Diablo II on the PC. That's how perfect, even with Horizon being a single player only game. Is there a Go Fund Me for the developers so they can hurry up and get a sequel done?!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: This game has the flavor of the rebooted Tomb Raider series with an immerse linear storyline and an enormous landscape to traverse. The characters are well drawn and enemy AI well done and surprising. As with other recent very large open world games (Tomb Raider, Assassin's Creed, Uncharted) there is a central sense of purpose to the many hours of exploration. The crafting and weapons systems are well done and the graphics outstanding. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth Evans

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Must Play Game
customer_reviews.text: Loooooove this game! Multiple levels of difficulty, the story is fresh, and the art work is beautiful. You’ll get lost for hours with this game.
customer_reviews.author: smilesmi

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would get amnesia and play again just for the experience of it all.
customer_reviews.text: I 100%'d this game. Absolutely completely gorgeous game and I think everyone needs to play it. Graphics 10/10, story 10/10, gameplay 10/10. It's one of those where you confuse the normal graphics for cutscenes. And of course it came perfectly spotless so, 10/10 errything.
customer_reviews.author: Maddeh

customer_reviews.title: Great game!!!
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this game is that there's tons of things to do beyond the main story line. Lots of side missions!!! Also you play on this large map and can use the landscape to your advantage when taking down these large machines. It's a great game to play!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful game
customer_reviews.text: Great story, gameplay and everything else. The story mode is long enough and there's a lot to explore and do during and afterwards. Haven't played online.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Resplandor

customer_reviews.title: Great story, amazing gameplay
customer_reviews.text: I'm still not finished, but I will say this game has blown me away. Great story, amazing gameplay, fantastic graphics (I'm using a PS4 Pro), and amazing sound. This game should have won Game of the Year had it not been for Zelda. Zelda deservedly won, but this was right behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Loved, loved, loved this game. I enjoyed the game when it came out, so I ordered the Complete Edition for my niece as a Christmas gift. Aloy is a great character, and I enjoyed her journey.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps the best game of this generation
customer_reviews.text: Horizon ZD scores on every level - it has a strong claim to being the best game of this generation. The additional content in the Complete Edition is excellent. Highly recommended, if you haven't already played it.
customer_reviews.author: Yieldman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: A great little adventure awaiting. First time I played a female hero in a game!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boring game hidden under the glorious graphics
customer_reviews.text: It gets boring fast. Very dull open world and story.
customer_reviews.author: Noble the Beast

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad game. Good addition to my collection. Great graphics, control, and cool bosses.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed watching this on youtube
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this so much on youtube even with out a ps4 I bought it. Support the dev's I guess.
customer_reviews.author: W. Carney

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my wife.. and I haven't been able to play Battlefield ever since
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife.. and I haven't been able to play Battlefield ever since... lol
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cordero

customer_reviews.title: Must have game
customer_reviews.text: I have not stopped playing this since I got it! Never heard of it and bought it on a whim. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Renault J. Carrington

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: One of the most well put together games I have played in a while. It combines open world, leveling up, unique story and a very beautiful design.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Martello

customer_reviews.title: Addicting!!
customer_reviews.text: Must. Stop. Playing... Must. Put. Controller. Down... Can't. Stop. !!! Love this game. Very fun!! Had no idea what it was. Now I can't stop playing. Wide world. Interesting story line.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Very enjoyable game.
customer_reviews.text: It's very close to being a true sandbox game. You can go about anywhere, do or ignore quests, and die a lot if you are not paying attention to where you are. Both my son and I enjoyed it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Mom

customer_reviews.title: I love this game!!!
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are beautiful, and the attention to detail is exquisite. Fans of the Tomb Raider games on PS4 will find similarities with crafting, stealth and using weapons. This is a great game.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: A Winner
customer_reviews.text: What a game and story. Graphics are exceptional and the game pay is pretty simple. I like that the game difficulty can be adjusted without starting over.
customer_reviews.author: TJJ

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive entertainment
customer_reviews.text: A well above the average video game. It was offered at an attractive price, being beyond its hype intro. A nice derversion from the wind up mind struggles of my real world day.
customer_reviews.author: William S

customer_reviews.title: Just got it and I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.text: I already am in love with this game and the graphics. I love the open world and the taking down of enemies and exploring. I'm not very far in the game but it's very good for those who love open world games
customer_reviews.author: Bella

product_meta.title: Horizon Zero Dawn: Complete Edition - PlayStation 4
product_meta.description: Horizon Zero Dawn is an exhilarating action role playing game exclusively for the PlayStation 4 System, developed by the award winning Guerrilla Games, creators of PlayStation's venerated Killzone franchise. Take on the role of skilled hunter Aloy as you explore a vibrant and lush world inhabited by mysterious mechanized creatures. Embark on a compelling, emotional journey and unravel mysteries of tribal societies, ancient artifacts and advanced technologies that will determine the fate of this planet, and of life itself.
feature_bullets: A Lush Post-Apocalyptic World - How have machines dominated this world, and what is their purpose?  What happened to the civilization here before?
Nature and Machines Collide - Horizon Zero Dawn juxtaposes two contrasting elements, taking a vibrant world rich with beautiful nature and filling it with awe-inspiring highly advanced technology.
Defy Overwhelming Odds - The foundation of combat in Horizon Zero Dawn is built upon the speed and cunning of Aloy versus the raw strength and size of the machines.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,481 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
